languages.text: {n}Покрытый кровью и ошметками изрубленой плоти, Маражай тяжело дышит — но не от усталости, а от возбуждения: его лицо словно посветлело и наполнилось энергией, глаза, обычно темные, сияют темно-бирюзовым огнем, а рот растянут в голодном оскале. Кажется, от переполняющих его сил друкари вот-вот взорвется.{/n} "Смотри... еще одна кучка забившегося в угол мяса".

{n}Splattered with blood and pieces of ripped flesh, Marazhai is panting — not from fatigue but excitement: his face looks brighter and more vivacious, his usually dark eyes now shine with deep turquoise fire, and his mouth is stretched wide in a ravenous grin. The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."
languages.original_text: {n}Покрытый кровью и ошметками изрубленой плоти, Маражай тяжело дышит — но не от усталости, а от возбуждения: его лицо словно посветлело и наполнилось энергией, глаза, обычно темные, сияют темно-бирюзовым огнем, а рот растянут в голодном оскале. Кажется, от переполняющих его сил друкари вот-вот взорвется.{/n} "Смотри... еще одна кучка забившегося в угол мяса".

The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."

The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."

The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."

{n}Splattered with blood and pieces of ripped flesh, Marazhai is panting — not from fatigue but excitement: his face looks brighter and more vivacious, his usually dark eyes now shine with deep turquoise fire, and his mouth is stretched wide in a ravenous grin. The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋身上溅满了鲜血与撕裂的肉块。他气喘吁吁，并非因为疲劳，而是出于兴奋。他的脸看起来更加明亮，更加鲜活，原本漆黑的双眼此刻闪烁着绿松石色的烈焰。他的嘴巴张得大大的，露出了贪婪的笑容，他体内这股压倒性的能量，几乎要将他撑炸了。{/n}“看啊……又一堆被逼入绝境的肉。”
languages.original_text: {n}Splattered with blood and pieces of ripped flesh, Marazhai is panting — not from fatigue but excitement: his face looks brighter and more vivacious, his usually dark eyes now shine with deep turquoise fire, and his mouth is stretched wide in a ravenous grin. The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋身上溅满了鲜血与撕裂的肉块。他气喘吁吁，并非因为疲劳，而是出于兴奋。他的脸看起来更加明亮，更加鲜活，原本漆黑的双眼此刻闪烁着绿松石色的烈焰。他的嘴巴张得大大的，露出了贪婪的笑容，他体内这股压倒性的能量，几乎要将他撑炸了。{/n}“看啊……又一堆被逼入绝境的肉。”

languages.text: {n}血と引き裂かれた肉片が飛び散り、マラズハイは荒く息を繰り返している…疲れからではなく、興奮から。顔は明るく生き生きとしており、常であれば暗い目は深いターコイズ色の炎で輝いていて、口は獲物を前にした笑みで大きく広がっている。デュカーリの体は、このドッと押し寄せるエネルギーの放出に適応しているようだ。{/n}「見ろ…追い詰められた新しい肉の山だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Splattered with blood and pieces of ripped flesh, Marazhai is panting — not from fatigue but excitement: his face looks brighter and more vivacious, his usually dark eyes now shine with deep turquoise fire, and his mouth is stretched wide in a ravenous grin. The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."

traits.locale_text: {n}血と引き裂かれた肉片が飛び散り、マラズハイは荒く息を繰り返している…疲れからではなく、興奮から。顔は明るく生き生きとしており、常であれば暗い目は深いターコイズ色の炎で輝いていて、口は獲物を前にした笑みで大きく広がっている。デュカーリの体は、このドッと押し寄せるエネルギーの放出に適応しているようだ。{/n}「見ろ…追い詰められた新しい肉の山だ」

languages.text: {n}Salpicado de sangre y carne desgarrada, Marazhai jadea. No es fruto del cansancio sino de la emoción. Su rostro es luminoso y vivo, en sus ojos, normalmente oscuros, arde un fuego turquesa y tiene una gran sonrisa voraz. El Drukhari parece a punto de estallar por una descarga de energía.{/n} «Mira... otro montón de carne acorralada».
languages.original_text: {n}Splattered with blood and pieces of ripped flesh, Marazhai is panting — not from fatigue but excitement: his face looks brighter and more vivacious, his usually dark eyes now shine with deep turquoise fire, and his mouth is stretched wide in a ravenous grin. The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Salpicado de sangre y carne desgarrada, Marazhai jadea. No es fruto del cansancio sino de la emoción. Su rostro es luminoso y vivo, en sus ojos, normalmente oscuros, arde un fuego turquesa y tiene una gran sonrisa voraz. El Drukhari parece a punto de estallar por una descarga de energía.{/n} «Mira... otro montón de carne acorralada».

languages.text: {n}Couvert de sang et de lambeaux de chair, Marazhai a le souffle court, non pas en raison de l'épuisement, mais d'une excitation fébrile : ses traits sont plus vifs et plus clairs que d'habitude et dans ses yeux d'ordinaire si sombres brille une flamme turquoise, alors que sa bouche s'étire en un rictus carnassier. Le Drukhari semble sur le point d'éclater sous la pression de cet afflux d'énergie accablant.{/n} « Voyez... il reste encore un tas de viande à équarrir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Splattered with blood and pieces of ripped flesh, Marazhai is panting — not from fatigue but excitement: his face looks brighter and more vivacious, his usually dark eyes now shine with deep turquoise fire, and his mouth is stretched wide in a ravenous grin. The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Couvert de sang et de lambeaux de chair, Marazhai a le souffle court, non pas en raison de l'épuisement, mais d'une excitation fébrile : ses traits sont plus vifs et plus clairs que d'habitude et dans ses yeux d'ordinaire si sombres brille une flamme turquoise, alors que sa bouche s'étire en un rictus carnassier. Le Drukhari semble sur le point d'éclater sous la pression de cet afflux d'énergie accablant.{/n} « Voyez... il reste encore un tas de viande à équarrir. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ist übersät mit Blut und zerfetzten Fleischstücken und er keucht – nicht vor Erschöpfung, sondern vor Aufregung: Sein Gesicht strahlt und wirkt quicklebendig, seine sonst dunklen Augen leuchten mittlerweile in dunkeltürkisfarbenem Feuer, und sein Mund hat sich zu einem widerlichen Grinsen verzogen. Der Drukhari wirkt, als würde er von einer überwältigenden Welle von Energie gleich platzen.{/n} "Schaut ... noch ein Haufen eingepferchten Fleisches."
languages.original_text: {n}Splattered with blood and pieces of ripped flesh, Marazhai is panting — not from fatigue but excitement: his face looks brighter and more vivacious, his usually dark eyes now shine with deep turquoise fire, and his mouth is stretched wide in a ravenous grin. The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ist übersät mit Blut und zerfetzten Fleischstücken und er keucht – nicht vor Erschöpfung, sondern vor Aufregung: Sein Gesicht strahlt und wirkt quicklebendig, seine sonst dunklen Augen leuchten mittlerweile in dunkeltürkisfarbenem Feuer, und sein Mund hat sich zu einem widerlichen Grinsen verzogen. Der Drukhari wirkt, als würde er von einer überwältigenden Welle von Energie gleich platzen.{/n} "Schaut ... noch ein Haufen eingepferchten Fleisches."

languages.text: {n}Deşilen etten sıçrayan kan ve parçalara bulanan Marazhai, yorgunluktan ziyade heyecandan nefes nefese kalıyor. Yüzü daha parlak ve canlı duruyor. Normalde koyu renkteki gözleri; şimdi yoğun, turkuaz alevle parıldıyor ve ağzına kurt gibi aç bir gülümseme yayılıyor. Drukhari, bu yoğun enerji dalgasıyla tıka basa doymuş gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Baksana... Köşeye sıkışmış bir et yığını daha."
languages.original_text: {n}Splattered with blood and pieces of ripped flesh, Marazhai is panting — not from fatigue but excitement: his face looks brighter and more vivacious, his usually dark eyes now shine with deep turquoise fire, and his mouth is stretched wide in a ravenous grin. The Drukhari seems fit to burst from this overwhelming surge of energy.{/n} "Look... another pile of cornered meat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deşilen etten sıçrayan kan ve parçalara bulanan Marazhai, yorgunluktan ziyade heyecandan nefes nefese kalıyor. Yüzü daha parlak ve canlı duruyor, normalde koyu renkteki gözleri şimdi yoğun bir turkuaz alevle parıldıyor ve ağzına kurt gibi aç bir gülümseme yayılıyor. Drukhari, bu yoğun enerji dalgasıyla tıka basa doymuş gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Baksana... Köşeye sıkışmış bir et yığını daha."
